title: Australia 22-12 Lions: Wallabies bounce back to deny Lions series whitewash
description: The British and Irish Lions are heavily beaten by Australia in a dramatic weather-delayed third Test in Sydney.
content: The conditions were savagely difficult, from the free-scoring wonder of Melbourne to a serious scrap in Sydney. Every inch was hard won, every collision brutal. The rain might have been a great leveller if it hadn't been for the demonic intensity of ... [3866 chars]

title: Jon Ruben remanded into custody on child cruelty charges after children fell ill at summer camp
description: Leicestershire Police received a report of children feeling unwell at a camp being held at Stathern Lodge, near Melton, last Sunday.
content:
A man has been remanded into custody charged with child cruelty offences after allegedly lacing sweets with sedatives.
Jon Ruben, 76, of Ruddington, Nottinghamshire, appeared at Leicester Magistrates' Court on Saturday after youngsters fell ill at a ... [1472 chars]

title: RAF Brize Norton: Further arrest over break-in and paint spraying
description: A man, 22, was arrested on Friday in relation to the incident, in which £7 million in damage was caused.
content: Amy Gardiner-Gibson, 29, Jony Cink, 24, Daniel Jeronymides-Norie, 35, and Lewie Chiaramello, 22, were charged with conspiracy to commit criminal damage, and conspiracy to enter a prohibited place knowingly for a purpose prejudicial to the safety or i... [1463 chars]

title: Steve Rosenberg: Russia is staying quiet on Trump's nuclear move
description: The US president said he's ordered two nuclear submarines to move closer to Russia, after a social media spat with Russia's ex-president.
content:
Trump had been sparring with Medvedev on social media for several days.
After the US president had reduced his 50-day deadline for Russia to end its war in Ukraine to less than two weeks, Medvedev posted that Trump was "playing the ultimatum game wit... [1960 chars]
